Room.Name: Riverdell Way/Oceancrest Avenue Intersection
Room.ShortDescription: You are at the intersection of Riverdell Way and Oceancrest Avenue.
Room.LongDescription: Riverdell Way runs north and south through the intersection with Oceancrest Avenue, which runs east and west through town. Oceancrest Avenue runs from the eastern entrance to the city towards the docks in Nylandian bay in the west. Riverdell Way runs from the north city walls all the way to the southern city walls.
